summary: The story of U.S. fighter pilots shot down over North Vietnam who became POWs for up to 8 and a half years.
cast: Everett Alvarez|Ron Bliss|Fred Cherry|George Day|Jeremiah Denton|Paul Galanti|Tom Hanks|Douglas Hegdahl|Sam Johnson|Tom Madison|John McCain|John McGrath|George McKnight|Kevin McManus|Tom McNish|Ed Mechenbier|Douglas Peterson|Robinson Risner|Robert H. Shumaker|Jim Stockdale|Richard Stratton
director: Directors: Freida Lee Mock, Terry Sanders
title: Return with Honor
